!Mercenary Kahman: There are two classes here, rookie and elite. An elite mercenary is a veteran with a long record of active service. The title earns you special priviliges. Rookies must kill Needle Stakatos as well as Splinter Stakatos to gain elite status. Collect *one-hundred Chitins each of Splinter Stakatos and Needle Stakatos* to earn the title. Show them what you're worth!
